description: this package will run dynamic browser tests with coverage (via istanbul and electron)
name: kaizhu-sandbox

scripts.example.js: . ./index.sh && shInit && shFileTrimLeft tmp/README.example.js && shRunScreenCapture shReadmeTestJs example.js
scripts.start: export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && if [ -f assets.app.js ]; then node assets.app.js; return; fi && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && ./index.sh shRun shIstanbulCover node test.js
scripts.test: export PORT=$(./index.sh shServerPortRandom) && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && ./index.sh test node test.js
